mapper.sql: id, users_id, equinfo_id, equfence_id, concentrator_id, equ_num, pass_timestamp, currlat, currlng, is_send
mapper.select: select equ_num from surpass a group by equ_num

select
from surpass where equ_num=#{equ_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and pass_timestamp = (select max(pass_timestamp) from surpass where equ_num=#{equ_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.insert:
insert into surpass
users_id,
equinfo_id,
equfence_id,
concentrator_id,
equ_num,
pass_timestamp,
currlat,
currlng,
is_send,

mapper.update:
update surpass
users_id = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
equinfo_id = #{equinfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
equfence_id = #{equfenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
concentrator_id = #{concentratorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
equ_num = #{equNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pass_timestamp = #{passTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
currlat = #{currlat,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
currlng = #{currlng,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
is_send = #{isSend,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update surpass set users_id = #{usersId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, equinfo_id = #{equinfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, equfence_id = #{equfenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, concentrator_id = #{concentratorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, equ_num = #{equNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass_timestamp = #{passTimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, currlat = #{currlat,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, currlng = #{currlng,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, is_send = #{isSend,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
